meanings.definition: A person who acts independently or irresponsibly.
meanings.sent1: The freewheeler decided to quit his job and travel the world on a whim.
meanings.sent2: The freewheeler always made spontaneous plans without considering the consequences.
meanings.sent3: The freewheeler forgot to bring an umbrella on a rainy day, but laughed it off.
meanings.sent4: She was a freewheeler in the world of fashion, always setting her own trends.
meanings.sent5: The freewheeler's carefree attitude inspired others to embrace their independence.

meanings.definition: A vehicle that can coast without pedaling or using the motor.
meanings.sent1: The freewheeler bike glided effortlessly down the hill without any effort.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed riding the freewheeler around the park without getting tired.
meanings.sent3: The freewheeler scooter was a hit at the beach, making transportation fun.
meanings.sent4: The freewheeler skateboard rolled smoothly along the sidewalk, powered only by momentum.
meanings.sent5: The freewheeler car coasted silently down the road, saving fuel and energy.
